summary: Fixed 3 LaTeX formatting issues in 02-ConstitutiveFoundation.tex: updated variable notation from x/y/z to v/v_i for object-language variables, consolidated 3 derived operator definitions into single enumerated definition, and added explicit Identity Sentences definition with cross-reference from Logical Consequence.
